columns.name: ${AGGREGATION_UNIT}_id
columns.comment: DIMENSION: The id related to modw.${AGGREGATION_UNIT}s.

columns.name: year
columns.comment: DIMENSION: The year of the ${AGGREGATION_UNIT}

columns.name: ${AGGREGATION_UNIT}
columns.comment: DIMENSION: The ${AGGREGATION_UNIT} of the year.

columns.name: host_resource_id
columns.comment: DIMENSION: The resource id of the host of a VM where sessions ran.

columns.name: account_id
columns.comment: DIMENSION: The account id associated with the VM.

columns.name: person_id
columns.comment: DIMENSION: The person id associated with a VM instance.

columns.name: systemaccount_id
columns.comment: DIMENSION: The system account id associated with a VM instance.

columns.name: processorbucket_id
columns.comment: DIMENSION: Pre-determined processor bucket sizes. References processorbucket.id

columns.name: memorybucket_id
columns.comment: DIMENSION: Pre-determined memory bucket sizes. References memorybucket.id

columns.name: instance_type_id
columns.comment: DIMENSION: Type of instance on which an event occurred.

columns.name: num_cores
columns.comment: FACT: Number of cores on a VM.

columns.name: core_time
columns.comment: FACT: Core hours reserved by a VM.

columns.name: memory_reserved
columns.comment: FACT: Memory reserved by a VM.

columns.name: rv_storage_reserved
columns.comment: FACT: Root volume storage space reserved by a VM.

columns.name: memory_mb
columns.comment: FACT: Amount of memory in MB reserved by a VM.

columns.name: disk_gb
columns.comment: FACT: Disk size in GB reserved by a VM.

columns.name: num_sessions_running
columns.comment: FACT: Number of sessions running in a given period.

columns.name: num_sessions_started
columns.comment: FACT: Number of sessions started over a given period.

columns.name: num_sessions_ended
columns.comment: FACT: Number of sessions ended over a given period.

columns.name: wallduration
columns.comment: FACT: (seconds) The wall duration of the sessions that were running during this period.

columns.name: submission_venue_id
columns.comment: DIMENSION: The venue that a job or virtual machine was initiated from.
